question:
####UFAQ [Michael Boggs]
If the Runner plays By Any Means and then accesses an [Archangel](/en/card/09013), can the Runner trash the Archangel before encountering it?
answer:
Yes. Whenever more than one ability meet their trigger conditions, first the active player's abilities resolve, then the inactive player's abilities resolve. If one of those abilities moves the card being accessed to a different zone, no further "when accessed" abilities can resolve.

If the Runner plays By Any Means and then accesses an advanced [Project Junebug](/en/card/01069), can the Corp deal net damage?
